articles.description: Philippe Coutinho is reportedly interested in joining Eddie Howe's Newcastle United next season, with Aston Villa struggling to match their offer.
articles.content:
Aston Villa loanee Philippe Coutinho is reportedly open to the idea of joining Eddie Howe’s Newcastle United next season.
Coutinho was involved in the biggest shock signing from the January window w… [+2017 chars]

articles.title: 'Two red cards and a stonewall penalty' - Man City fans furious after Liverpool win vs Everton - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester City fans are all saying the same thing after Liverpool secured a 2-0 win over Everton
articles.content:
Manchester City fans have been expressing their disbelief that Everton weren't awarded a potentially crucial penalty against Liverpool.

articles.title: Andrey Rublev beats Novak Djokovic in final Serbia Open in Belgrade - BBC
articles.description: Andrey Rublev denies Novak Djokovic a first title of the season by beating the world number one in the final of the Serbia Open.
articles.content:
Rublev added the Serbia Open title to wins in Dubai and Marseille earlier this year

articles.author: RobertJones
articles.title: 'You cannot make sudden movements, he hit my hip'; Rea blames Razgatlioglu - Crash
articles.description: Jonathan Rea believes WorldSBK champion Toprak Razgatlioglu was to blame for their race two collision in Assen, saying ‘he hit my hip’ after failing to ‘give way’ following a mistake at turn one.
articles.content: Reas hopes of completing a second consecutive Assen WorldSBK hat-trick were dashed, as was Razgatlioglus efforts of winning a first race this season, by contact that has often been made between the t… [+3994 chars]
